Bash("C:\Program Files\Python311\python.exe" -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect(''app.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()
cursor.execute(''SELECT id, name, avatar FROM students WHERE id = 1'')
result = cursor.fetchone()
print(''Student ID 1:'', result)
cursor.execute(''SELECT id, name, avatar FROM students LIMIT 5'')
results = cursor.fetchall()
print(''All students:'')
for row in results:
    print(f''  ID {row[0]}: {row[1]} - avatar: {row[2]}'')
conn.close()
")

Bash("C:\Program Files\Python311\python.exe" -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect(''app.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()
cursor.execute(''SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=""table""'')
tables = cursor.fetchall()
print(''Tables:'', tables)
if tables:
    cursor.execute(''SELECT id, nickname, avatar_url FROM children LIMIT 5'')
    results = cursor.fetchall()
    print(''Children:'')
    for row in results:
        print(f''  ID {row[0]}: {row[1]} - avatar: {row[2]}'')
conn.close()
")

Bash("C:\Program Files\Python311\python.exe" -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect(''app.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()
cursor.execute(''PRAGMA table_info(users)'')
columns = cursor.fetchall()
print(''Users table columns:'')
for col in columns:
    print(f''  {col}'')
cursor.execute(''SELECT id, username, nickname, avatar_url, role FROM users WHERE role=""student"" LIMIT 5'')
results = cursor.fetchall()
print(''\nStudent users:'')
for row in results:
    print(f''  ID {row[0]}: {row[1]} ({row[2]}) - avatar: {row[3]} - role: {row[4]}'')
conn.close()
")

import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect(''app.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()
cursor.execute(''SELECT id, username, role FROM users WHERE role=""student"" LIMIT 5'')
results = cursor.fetchall()
print(''Student users:'')
for row in results:
    print(f''  ID {row[0]}: {row[1]} - role: {row[2]}'')
print()
cursor.execute(''SELECT id, username, role FROM users WHERE role=""parent"" LIMIT 5'')
results = cursor.fetchall()
print(''Parent users:'')
for row in results:
    print(f''  ID {row[0]}: {row[1]} - role: {row[2]}'')
conn.close()
")

Bash("C:\Program Files\Python311\python.exe" -c "
import sqlite3
import hashlib
from datetime import datetime

conn = sqlite3.connect(''app.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()

# åˆ›å»ºå®¶é•¿ç”¨æˆ·
try:
    # æ’å…¥å®¶é•¿ç”¨æˆ·
    password_hash = hashlib.sha256(''123456''.encode()).hexdigest()
    cursor.execute(''''''
        INSERT INTO users (username, email, password_hash, role, avatar_url) 
        VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
    '''''', (''parent31'', ''parent31@test.com'', password_hash, ''parent'', ''emoji:ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§â€ğŸ‘¦''))
    parent_id = cursor.lastrowid
    print(f''Created parent user with ID: {parent_id}'')
    
    # ç¡®ä¿student1å­˜åœ¨å¹¶è®¾ç½®æ˜µç§°å’Œå…¶ä»–å±æ€§
    cursor.execute(''UPDATE users SET avatar_url = ?, username = ? WHERE id = 1'', 
                   (''/uploads/avatars/child1.jpg'', ''student1''))
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥ParentChildè¡¨æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™åˆ›å»º
    cursor.execute(''''''
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS parent_children (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            parent_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            child_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            nickname VARCHAR(50),
            grade VARCHAR(20),
            school VARCHAR(100),
            relationship VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT ''child'',
            is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
            created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
            FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES users (id),
            FOREIGN KEY (child_id) REFERENCES users (id)
        )
    '''''')
    
    # åˆ›å»ºå®¶é•¿-å­©å­å…³ç³»
    cursor.execute(''''''
        INSERT INTO parent_children (parent_id, child_id, nickname, grade, school, is_active)
        VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
    '''''', (parent_id, 1, ''å°å®è´'', ''ä¸‰å¹´çº§'', ''å®éªŒå°å­¦'', True))
    
    print(''Created parent-child relationship'')
    
    conn.commit()
    
    # éªŒè¯æ•°æ®
    cursor.execute(''SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = ""parent""'')
    parents = cursor.fetchall()
    print(''Parents:'', parents)
    
    cursor.execute(''SELECT * FROM parent_children'')
    relations = cursor.fetchall()
    print(''Parent-child relations:'', relations)
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Error: {e}'')
    conn.rollback()

conn.close()
print(''Database setup complete!'')
")

import sqlite3

conn = sqlite3.connect(''app.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()

# é‡å‘½åè¡¨
cursor.execute(''DROP TABLE IF EXISTS parent_child'')
cursor.execute(''ALTER TABLE parent_children RENAME TO parent_child'')

print(''Table renamed successfully'')

# æ£€æŸ¥æ•°æ®
cursor.execute(''SELECT * FROM parent_child'')
relations = cursor.fetchall()
print(''Parent-child relations:'', relations)

conn.commit()
conn.close()
")

import jwt
import datetime

# ä½¿ç”¨å’Œåç«¯ç›¸åŒçš„å¯†é’¥å’Œç®—æ³•
SECRET_KEY = ''your-secret-key-here''
ALGORITHM = ''HS256''

# ä¸ºå®¶é•¿ç”¨æˆ·ï¼ˆID=2ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºtoken
payload = {
    ''sub'': ''parent_2'',
    ''user_id'': 2,
    ''role'': ''parent'',
    ''iat'': datetime.datetime.utcnow(),
    ''exp'': datetime.datetime.utcnow() + datetime.timedelta(days=1)
}

token = jwt.encode(payload, SECRET_KEY, algorithm=ALGORITHM)
print(''Parent token:'', token)
")
